name: Randungeon (CharlieW64)
description:
Randungeon is a platformer of randomly slected micro levels and a casino which can be used to gamble for health or gamble for more money.

Controls:

Keyboard:

  • Arrow keys: Move/Aim
  • X/Space: Jump
  • Z:Shoot
  • 0:Toggle performance mode
  • F11: Fullscreen

Gamepad:

  • LStick/D-pad: Move/Aim
  • A: Jump
  • X: Shoot

Credits:

  • Main theme: https://freesound.org/people/rap2h/sounds/223241/
  • Death sound: https://freesound.org/people/Deathbygeko/sounds/190843/
  • Gun fire: https://freesound.org/people/Prof.Mudkip/sounds/386862/
  • Font: https://www.dafont.com/04b-30.font

Game made for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam
